name: Serene Secular Social Service Society (SSSSS)
briefDescription: we work for women working under bonded labour in spinning mills for their rights.( women ringhts )Women  labour Rights Women  Empowerment,  Reproductive  Health  and   Health RightsMicro – CreditSustainable  Agriculture  DevelopmentChild  welfare  and  community  development	Issues  on   legal  &  political Special  programmesGiving awareness programmes about the rights of the people in the society.Environment awareness programmes. Charitable primary education to aged people.Giving importance of special coaching and tuition to children.Spinning Mills Labours welfare programme.
